T02D2845:183b-0: @183b * // thugs rje chen po bkra shis kun du snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2845:183b-1: de nas kun du snang ba bkra shis byed //
T02D2845:183b-2: ces 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o //
T02D2845:183b-3: slob dpon gang zhig gdul bya'i don mthong bas blo rab tu phyogs te ;
T02D2845:183b-4: bsil khang gi rnga yab lta bur gzhan gyi dbang gis g-yo zhing mi brtan pa thob pa na /
T02D2845:183b-5: des bdag la dad cing ltos pa dor ba rnams
T02D2845:183b-6: kyi don du 'phags pa zla ba'i kha dog can
T02D2845:183b-8: dkar po'i tshes brgyad dang bcu dang bco lnga la
T02D2845:183b-9: ji snyed 'byor pa'i yo byad dang ldan pas yid
T02D2845:184a-0: dang mthun pa'i gnas byin gyis @184a * //
T02D2845:184a-2: bkra shis bzang dang bkra shis nor 'bru sman //
T02D2845:184a-3: bkra shis mchod rdzas dang ni bkra shis brgyan //
T02D2845:184a-4: dpal ldan bkra shis dkyil 'khor cher bri la //
T02D2845:184a-5: bkra shis rgyal po spyan ras gzigs dbang dgug /
T02D2845:184a-6: gang dag gang gi phyir dang gang du ji ltar
T02D2845:184a-7: bya ba'i rang bzhin thams cad la bkra shis zhes
T02D2845:184a-8: sbyar ro // shis pa brjod pa'i dbyangs dang sems
T02D2845:184a-9: dang rjes su mthun pa'i rol mo dang glus mchod
T02D2845:184a-10: sbyar ro // do // me tog dkar dmar dang
T02D2845:184a-11: tsandan dkar dmar dang rgyan dang dri'i khyad par nges
T02D2845:184a-12: sbyar ro // do // pa'o // yo byad glo
T02D2845:184a-13: bur ba dang gsar du skyes pa mtha' dag la
T02D2845:184a-14: rgyal bar gyur pa'i tshig sngon du song bas so
T02D2845:184a-15: sbyar ro // do // pa'o // // sbyin bdag
T02D2845:184a-16: gam slob ma'i lus bkrus la bkra shis kun du
T02D2845:184a-18: dge ba'i dkyil 'khor zlum po dkar //
T02D2845:184a-19: kun du 'od mdzad thugs rje che //
T02D2845:184a-21: sa gnon ting 'dzin mchog gis brjid //
T02D2845:184a-22: de nas 'khor lo'i rtsibs brgyad la gdugs la sogs pa brgyad do //
T02D2845:184a-23: mu khyud la grub pa nyi shu'o //
T02D2845:184a-24: steng nas bkra shis kyi rdzas sna tshogs pa'i char 'bebs pa lha'i sku brgya stong phrag mang po'o //
T02D2845:184a-25: mchod pa'i sprin du ma las 'brug sgra dal bus sgrogs pa dang /
T02D2845:184a-27: 'og nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pas
T02D2845:184a-28: bum pa nor bus gang ba 'bul pa'i tshul lo
T02D2845:184a-29: // rdo rje slob dpon kun du snang //
T02D2845:184a-30: bkra shis rnam par snang mdzad kyi //
T02D2845:184a-31: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te //
T02D2845:184a-32: sngags brjod bum pa dgu gang bya //
T02D2845:184a-33: bum pa gang ba dgu la sngags kyi phreng ba dgu dgu bzhu bas byin gyis brlab po //
T02D2845:184a-34: rdzas snod dang bcud ma lus pa la ni lha
T02D2845:184a-35: rdzas kyi nor bu rdo rjes mtshan pa re res
T02D2845:184a-36: brgyan par ro // phyag dang bskor ba byas nas bgegs bsal te bkra shis sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2845:184a-37: rdo rje dril bu dpa' thogs la //
T02D2845:184a-38: snying rjes kun du bskor zhing rgyug / gnas dang gang zag rnal 'byor rnams //
T02D2845:184a-39: ma lus bsrung ba'i bkra shis stsol //
T02D2845:184a-41: aa ai au ae ao aam aa:shr'i a'ary'a wa lo
T02D2845:184a-42: ki te shvara mam ga la siddhi aa dhishth'a ne
T02D2845:184a-43: na ng'a na pa ti che ge mo'i sarba pa
T02D2845:184a-44: ri gra h'a svasti ma h'a mam ga la su
T02D2845:184a-45: mam ga la pra ti mam ga la siddhi siddhi
